items.sentence: You shouldn't say things like that when children are around.
Tom asked Mary to help him get a splinter out of his finger.
Tom tried to provoke a fight, but John wouldn't be provoked.
I didn't think that something like that would embarrass Tom.
All three cars in the parking lot exploded at the same time.
Tom never drinks anything that's not from a can or a bottle.
We should consider the problem from a child's point of view.
You say you're a vegetarian, but I just saw you eating meat.
If I hadn't come to Australia, this never would've happened.
I'm thinking of coming to Australia with my wife next month.
